details.description_text: Brand: TAATI POINT Product Type: Noyon Tara Khesh Saree Main Material: Halfsilk Gender: Women Long: 13 Haat Color: Same As Picture Very comfortable to use in any weather #Sari #sari #saree #শাড়ি #sari collection #saree for women #Sarees #saree #শাড়ি Experience timeless elegance and comfort with the Trendy Half Silk Noyon Tara Khesh Saree for Women, brought to you by TAATI POINT. This saree combines traditional charm with modern style, making it an ideal choice for women who appreciate both cultural heritage and contemporary fashion.Key Features:Brand TAATI POINT: TAATI POINT is a reputable brand known for its commitment to quality and fashionable offerings.Noyon Tara Khesh Saree: This saree features the classic Noyon Tara Khesh design, characterized by the intricate patterns and traditional weaving techniques. It showcases the rich cultural heritage of saree craftsmanship.High-Quality Half Silk: Crafted from high-quality half silk material, this saree offers a luxurious and comfortable drape. The fabric is gentle on the skin and versatile for various occasions.Gender: Women: Designed exclusively for women, this saree is tailored to complement and enhance the natural grace and beauty of the wearer.Generous Length: With a length of 13 Haat, this saree provides ample fabric for graceful draping and styling.Variety of Colors: Available in a range of captivating colors, you can select the one that best matches your personal style and the occasion you're attending.Comfortable in Any Weather: The saree is designed to be very comfortable in any weather, making it suitable for both warm and cooler seasons.Versatile Sari: This saree is not only a symbol of cultural richness but also a versatile choice for various events, including weddings, festivals, and special gatherings.The Trendy Half Silk Noyon Tara Khesh Saree by TAATI POINT is a celebration of the rich heritage of saree weaving and design. It's a versatile and elegant addition to your wardrobe, perfect for embracing the beauty of traditional craftsmanship while staying in tune with modern fashion. Choose your preferred color and experience the timeless allure of this saree.
